name: Code Generation QA Dataset
description: Programming tasks for evaluating code generation quality and correctness

test_cases.input: Write a Python function to check if a number is prime
Create a JavaScript function to debounce a callback
Write a SQL query to find the top 5 customers by total purchases
test_cases.expected_output:
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) as total_purchases
FROM orders
GROUP BY customer_id
ORDER BY total_purchases DESC
LIMIT 5;

test_cases.input: Implement a binary search algorithm in Python
Create a React component for a toggle switch
Write a Python decorator to measure function execution time
Implement a LRU cache in Python
Create a REST API endpoint in Express.js to create a user
Write a function to flatten a nested array in JavaScript
Create a Python class for a simple stack data structure
